name: What Ha Noi means to you
description:
If ever you ever heard that Vietnam's shape is like a dragon, you certainly have known its capital, Ha Noi - "the dragon's eye". Hanoi is a mixture of both antique and dynamic atmosphere. It is the country's center of economic, culture, art and history. It is also famous for numerous of lakes, rivers, historical and beautiful heritage sites such as: The temple of Literature, Sword lake, Ho Chi Minh complex, Hoa Lo prison and so on.
Let's deep ourselves into the tranquil but dynamic life here!
